message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It comes with a range of features that we believe will enhance your daily experience. Given its quality and functionality, I'm offering it to you for $200. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the value we place on providing exceptional products to our customers. I look forward to your consideration.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the details you've provided. However, I'm looking to spend no more than $150 at this time. Would you be willing to consider a price of $150?

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and appreciate your interest in our product. While I would like to accommodate your budget, I must maintain my pricing strategy to ensure sustainability. I am willing to negotiate at $175, which still allows me to cover costs while offering a fair deal. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $175 is closer, I'm still aiming for $150.  Perhaps we could meet in the middle at $162.50? This would be a fair compromise for both of us.

I appreciate your effort to find a mutually beneficial solution, Bob. Considering your proposal, I am willing to reconsider and offer the product at $165. This price allows me to maintain a reasonable margin while still being competitive. I hope this revised offer works for you.
